## Important Discoveries

```{r, echo=FALSE}
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dygraphs))

dygraph(ldeaths, group = "lungs")
dygraph(mdeaths, group = "lungs")
dygraph(fdeaths, group = "lungs")


dygraph(discoveries,
  axes = dyAxis("y", label = "Total / Year"),
  options = list(
    showRangeSelector = TRUE
  )
)
```
